title: #68 - Pumped For Murder - The Brutalness of Bertil Fox
description:
This week, we look at a man whose outer perfection masked an insecure, angry, and very dangerous inside that eventually earned him the harshest sentence in CIS history. He was a prodigy at his profession, but his brain didn't seem to grow with his body, leaving the circumstances perfectly set up for violence, and tragedy. This is a hilarious tale of strange people, doing strange, and ridiculous things, that ends in severe violence. Our kind of story!Eat a dozen eggs, inject yourself with steroids, and commit a double murder with "Brutal" Bertil Fox!! Check us out, every Tuesday. We will continue to bring you the biggest idiots in sports history!

Hosted by James Pietragallo & Jimmie Whisman
